pages.text: The Lemon Haze Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Speed
Lemon Haze Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Lemon Haze Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Lemon Haze Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Lemon Haze Weed in an Extractor
You can package your lemon haze weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
